introduction: Kyungpil, who has lost all his money in the stock market, is about to commit suicide. However, he finds an AI speaker called ‘Mammons’ made by a genius engineer by chance. He does what Mammons says and finally becomes extremely wealthy and successful. He also marries a beautiful girl named Dahyun who is a famous TV anchor. So, it seems like there is only a bright future ahead of him. One day, Dahyun, who doesn’t know much about Mammons, accidentally touches the machine, and it starts to malfunction. Since then, Kyungpil and Dahyun have a number of serious fights and it keeps getting worse as time goes on. What is the secret behind Mammons and the mysterious death of the engineer?
